title: Worlds Finals 2016 - Any Hoyts viewing parties this year? ( Red response is appreciated )
body:
So, worlds is at a bit of a strange time for us this time around, but I haven't seen anything about local OCE viewing parties being set up. 

I'm in a position where I can organize something myself, but I was curious if there would be anything being hosted by Riot themselves before I go off making plans.

Anything to report?

replies.body: Oh yay so I have the choice of Wetherill Park, Penrith or Mt Druitt... I think I'll pass. Don't feel like getting stabbed whilst watching a game of Lol.

> [{quoted}](name=JesusForgotHisGA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hmEF0Lvo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-28T11:09:34.902+0000)
>
> Oh yay so I have the choice of Wetherill Park, Penrith or Mt Druitt... I think I'll pass. Don't feel like getting stabbed whilst watching a game of Lol.

probably a good necessity.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hmEF0Lvo,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-28T11:04:08.374+0000)
>
> I'd put it in Community Events, but it really doesn't matter too much ;)
> 
> Also, [make an event](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/) once you get stuff sorted. If enough people are interested **Maraudaur** can shout you out in a post like [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/XZaBmM3A-local-worlds-viewing-parties).

if a hoyts screening doesn't happen, I'll probably do something like this.

Hi! 

 I am a Belgian LoL player that is going to travel through Australia for the coming 3 months. The only downside to it, I will miss a lot of the action at worlds. So it would be amazing to watch the few games I can watch together with some locals.

So, are there places/viewing parties in Melbourne/Adelaide were I can watch worlds together with some local LoL players?


Greetings from Belgium!

> [{quoted}](name=Tiberivs,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hmEF0Lvo,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-28T15:49:39.960+0000)
>
> Hi! 
> 
>  I am a Belgian LoL player that is going to travel through Australia for the coming 3 months. The only downside to it, I will miss a lot of the action at worlds. So it would be amazing to watch the few games I can watch together with some locals.
> 
> So, are there places/viewing parties in Melbourne/Adelaide were I can watch worlds together with some local LoL players?
> 
> 
> Greetings from Belgium!

Greetings, Belgium!

There absolutely will be, though details will be more available closer to the date. :)

Green will do. 

appears as if sessions haven't actually been created yet ( or most of the cinemas I've checked just don't have anything there yet )

I may speak to Marauder or Cpt Stupendous about hosting one of these locations if something isn't already in the works. Would this be eSports, or community? it's kind of half way there

I'd put it in Community Events, but it really doesn't matter too much ;)

Also, [make an event](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/) once you get stuff sorted. If enough people are interested **Maraudaur** can shout you out in a post like [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/XZaBmM3A-local-worlds-viewing-parties).

Will a green do? :P

Yeap! Hoyts will be hosting a viewing party for the Season 6 World Finals on October 30th. 

[Here](http://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/2016/league_of_legends_2016_world_championship_finals.aspx)'s the event page from the Hoyts website if you want to check it out. You should double check to see if it will be available in a Hoyts near you, because they may have changed some of the screening locations.
